DataCommand.Name: Role_AddAllPermissions
DataCommand.Text: declare @RoleID varchar(50) SELECT @RoleID=RoleID FROM Role WHERE RoleName=@RoleName if(@RoleID IS NOT NULL) begin insert into rolepermission select @roleid, p.PermissionName, 1, p.createdon, p.createdby, p.modifiedon, p.modifiedby from permission p left outer join rolepermission rp on p.permissionname = rp.permissionname and rp.roleid = @roleid where rp.permissionname is null end
